content.detailedDescription: It was just after midnight. i was in my fully-dark room watching a movie on my laptop - my laptop was close to my face. my face was partially facing my window that faces my back yard. if i had been looking out my window from my position, i would have been looking toward the south.  there was a black common wire fan that was turned on and between me and the window. there are trees outside. the lights in the sky were bright enough to catch my eyes' peripheral vision even though they were behind the trees and fan and my bright computer screen was in front of me. there were two very bright orange-ish lights with maybe a hint of red that did not blink, flying pretty much in unison, from south to north. they seemed to be too far apart to be lights on the wingtips of one plane. i could not see a body to a plane; i only could see the lights. i ran to my back 2-story deck to see them outside. the lights were quite a bit larger than even a large plane's lights usually look, flying relatively low over my house going to the airport. you can't tell that in the video very well. i am very used to seeing all kinds of low-flying planes over my house because there is a small airport nearby - richard b. russell airport, rome, ga.  they were traveling about the same, consistent speed as i would expect a low-flying plane to travel. my initial thought was that they were within 300-500 feet above me but i really couldn't tell if they were very large and very high up or if they were actually low-flying because they were making no sound at all. if they were that low i would expect to hear some sound. from my vantage point, they were both larger and brighter than the brightest star you can ever see, at least twice as large and bright, maybe 3 times. they disappeared, one at a time, i think possibly flew behind some clouds after they flew over my house. i couldn't see any clouds, but i thought maybe the clouds were very dispersed and hard to see at night. a minute or so later i saw another single light that was the same color, size, and speed, traveling the same path (i first saw it in the south and it traveled to the north) and it also disappeared, i guess behind some clouds. the original video is posted at  we-evolve.Us/ufo/img_5171.Mov
content.summary: Large orange-ish lights flying across sky south to north with no sound, at least twice as bright as brightest star.

content.detailedDescription:
This incident happened when i was roughly 10 years old. my mother and i were on our way back home to brooklyn center minnesota from crystal minnesota. we were travelling northbound on highway 81 past the crystal airport at roughly 10-11 pm.
it was at this time i noticed a very intensely bright light roughly the size of a pea from our distance hovering roughly 500 feet about the ground out in the airfield. at this age (and still) i had a very large interest in aircraft and figured the object to be helicopter of some sort due to it's stationary nature. upon observation of the craft it shot from one side of the airfield to the other in a straight line seemingly instantly, acceleration that i now know would be at a rate seemingly impossible for a human being to withstand. the craft did this roughly 2 to 3 more times hovering in place for a few seconds between similar movements in different directions before accelerating rapidly vertically and disappearing from view within a second. i know i was young at the time but i still remember it clear as a bell to this day, even gives me the shivers still just typing this out.
content.summary: Bright orb stationary then moving at high speed and right angles then ascending at high speed until gone

content.detailedDescription: I heard what sounded like fireworks so i stepped out onto the deck, it was very dark and the night sky was bright, all of a sudden i notice what looked like sparks moving north directly over kentucky lake, they weren't sparks as they flew together, some side by side others in single file glowing a bright reddish orange color, there was absolutely no sound and no flashing lights. we have helicopters that fly over us heading to fort campbell but they are so loud you know they are coming.  i lost visual on them when they went behind a tree line blocking my view, i was waiting for them to show back up as they went past the trees but they did not, i have no idea were they went.  this is the second time i have seen something strange in the night sky here and my second report to mufon.
content.summary: Looked to night sky and seen about ten glowing objects

content.detailedDescription:
I had just left my room and was walking to work when in front of me something moving in the sky caught my eye.
i observed 3 lights the size of stars moving in a southerly direction in formation at about half the speed of what a plane would travel at cruising altitude. the 3 lights were approaching a single star so i double checked to see which lights were moving by identifying the positions of the near by stars and building structures that were in my view.
i could confirm that the 3 lights were moving and the single star, nearby stars and building was stationary.
i stopped walking and continued to observe the 3 lights for several seconds as they passed over the single star. the single star remained visible as the triangle of 3 lights passed over it. about 10 seconds later the 3 lights dimmed out until i could no longer see them in the sky any more.
this further confirmed that the 3 lights were moving independently in the sky.
the sky was black with nil cloud cover with bright stars.
i continued to look upwards in the same direction every now and then as i walked to my car but i couldn't stop and continue to observe due to time restraints and didn't see it any longer.
the photo attached i didn't take and is from a google search but is exactly what i saw.
content.summary: 3 lights in an equilateral triangle shape moving south in formation

content.detailedDescription: It was approximately 7:45 pm.  our house is located right on the water next to tampa bay.I walked outside to the back of my house to let our dog out.  i then noticed a strange cigar like object moving se to s that i couldn't identify. it was completely transfixing.  about 45 seconds into my observation, a orange orb instantly appeared directly to the right of the craft, then blinked out after about 2-3 seconds.  it was at this point that i pulled out my iphone and captured about 25 seconds of relatively shaky video.  you can definitely make the object out though.  there were no discernable normal aircraft lights and the craft made no sound.  in my video, a bird flies by in the foreground of the craft which gives the craft considerable scale. you could also probably determine the speed of the craft, as it's flying just above some cloud cover which should provide reference points for speed determination. as the object moved further away, i stopped taking video and ran inside to grab my binoculars.  when i returned a few seconds later, the object was gone.
content.summary: Cigar shaped object observed for 90 seconds - 25 seconds on video

content.detailedDescription: The witness and her husband were on their way home from his parents' home about midnight. they were sitting at an intersection on somerlot hoffman road west in marion, ohio.All of a sudden the objects (3) appeared immediately above the tree line.(it was a country road.) there were 3 groups of lights, 2 large groups and a smaller group. the smaller group shot across the road towards the church across the road, then all 3 disappeared as suddenly as they had appeared. they were only visible for a brief moment,maybe less than a minute. the witness and her husband saw them at the same time and were very startled. it was something they had never seen before. because it happened so suddenly, the size is something they are unsure of. they estimate the 2 larger objects to be about half the size of a compact car. it was a strange experience, and the witnesses, who had no prior experience or belief in ufo's were quite disturbed by the sighting.
content.summary: The objects appeared suddenly, then disappeared just as suddenly. they were more square than rectangular, with 2 large objects and 1 smaller, bright blue shining lights.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving along and saw what i thought were a couple of stars. then, i noticed that it was something cigar-shaped, and at one end there was a flashing red light, and at the other end, there was a flashing white light. i figured it must be a plane, but then i noticed that it didn't seem to be moving. when i stopped at a stop sign, i watched it for about 30 seconds, and it didn't move at all, but the lights were flashing. when i drove by a couple of minutes later, it was gone.
content.summary: I saw odd lights in the sky

content.detailedDescription: i was on my porch having a cigarette at approximately 11:42 when i saw a very bright orange slow moving orb move accross the sky and change direction. i was awestruck. i wanted to grab my camera but i was afraid i would miss the sighting. the object moved far away from me into the clouds until it was no longer visible.
content.summary: Very bright slow moving orange orb.

content.detailedDescription: I am 45 years old now but this happened when i was 12 years old. we use to live on a farm one mile out side of chrisney indiana. my father woke me up and ask me to get out my telescope he wanted me to set it up and show me something.We pointed the telescope out the west window and to my amazement we saw four cylinders in a row. each was higher in the air next to one another. they also had lights that went left to right in the center of the craft. the lights flashed up in the air but when one went down behind the trees it would turn its lights off and land the craft. my father told me that they were back at the stripper pit where their was water. all four was higher in succession from left to right. later the ship on the right came up out of the trees it would turn its lights back on. then the next ship on the left center went down and turn its light out. this went on for about an hour. we observed this in my telescope and got a good look at the crafts. there was still some light in the horizon so we could make out the shapes of the craft. they were cigar shape or saucer shape. later the craft that was high in the air just rose up and headed west at the same time until it was out of sight. later all four left in like manner. we never went to where they landed so i don't know it they left traces or not.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Four craft hovering in distance

content.detailedDescription:
After taking our family dog on a short walk with my daughter, we returned to our house. i went inside to unleash the dog. i grabbed some binoculars that were sitting near a table stand and went back outside.

i was standing in our backyard facing north looking up at the night sky/stars with the binocs. i then noticed a black triangular object moving very rapidly from the south east to the north west. i couldn't believe it. i had to move the binocs to keep pace with the craft. it was moving very fast.

each point on the triangle was dimly light with a very low whitish light. the triangle was solid black. i put down the binocs for approximately 1-2 seconds hoping i could see the craft with the naked eye. i could not see it at all.

i then placed the binocs back up to my eyes and started frantically searching in back and forth to re-locate the object. i was able to locate the object again and watched it for a few more seconds. i was thinking is this a duck, a bird, or something but i don't know what animal is in the shape of triangle with very low level white lights at each point. 

i was torn between wanting to call my wife to report my observation as it was happening (but my cell phone was in the house) or continue to observe the triangle. i gave in and called my wife. 

this event occurred this evening at approximately 9:30pm pst. i am basing the time of the event on my call log to my wife. my phone record shows i called her at 9:34pm pst. it took me a minute or two after witnessing the event to call her. i was/am in a state of complete shock. 

the binocs i used is the bushnell falcon 7x35mm model. i am attaching a ms paint drawing i made to show the detail of the object. the grey/white lights are not a close match to the color i observed but that is the closest i can get with the colors available in ms paint.
content.summary: Black triangle

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my dog at approximately 8:15 pm.  there was a plane flying from the north and also from the same direction came a flying object of some sort with very bright flashing and pulsing lights. it was how much brighter the lights were compared to plane that drew my attention.  as it passed over head in a southbound direction it appeared to be a purple pulsing glowing orb with some kind of reactions occurring within.  you could see the trail of energy, but no sound.  at this point it flew higher toward the south and hovered and moved irratically.  i snapped a few pictures with my phone, which came out, but my first attempt at video was 3 sec of the sidewalk and didnt record.  i went in the house to tell my girlfriend what  had saw, she grabbed her phone and came outside.  i saw the ufo high in the sky, i was able to record about a minute and a half of footage that came out pretty good (i attached below) and i zoomed in while recording.  i recorded until my phone died, at which point my girlfriend took over videoing with her phone.  i also had binoculars.  i observed more continued erratic floating and flight patterns and the colors seemed to change from red to blue-green- to yellowish-white and purple.  even when i lost sight of it i seemed to be able to find it again through the clouds (was a clear night for the most part).  i thought i saw tiny spec objects following it but i did not see on the footage yet, so i cannot confirm that.  the "orb" continued to change directions move up down left and right and hover in place.  at times upon zooming in, it appeared as though it became 2 balls of energy rapidly swirling around each other as it moved. the orb eventually continued to head north until it was out of my sight about 45 min later.  there were multiple planes that had flown through the area over the 45 min i had watched the orb.  i don't know if they were aware of its presence or not.  there were a few other people in the parking lot coming or going but none that seemed to notice us recording and watching the sky.
content.summary: Glowing orb hovered, pulsed, and floated around irratically changing shape and colors

content.detailedDescription: Was watching the moon from my bedroom window noticed a blue halo over the mooon march7 2015 around 11pm saw 2 ordbs ung in sky aboutb15 minutes to low to be starsvand close one flutherd out like a dead lightbulb the other moved in rapid turn and and direction got realy bright and kinda changed shape disapperd my feelings are interested its been on my mind for thw last year ocd
content.summary: It was 2 orbs then one disapered the the othe flutherd like snake and rapidly turned and flew away

content.detailedDescription: I first noticed the ufo in the out skirts of the city sonora texas because my husband reminded me of the city because he had a ticket in that city from speeding from a month ago from when we went to disneyland returning home to texas. so we are getting closer to the city i remember looking to the left side front window and i saw a bright light flickering! it looked like it was traveling with us. it went.Up, down, and around reverse and as the we aproched the city a storm hit and it flew like deep in to space like back not up. and once we drove north threw the storm on feb. 27, 2016 about around 12:00am and when we exit the storm and the city of sonora and i opened the sun roof cover so i can see the sky and there it was flying above us. again up down around flickering blinking flashing changing its directions. the ship was crestish triangular with the bright light in the middle front blinkin and wings looked gray or silverish. it would also drift in the clouds. we kept driving then we pulled over to the rest stop north hwy70 to use the restroom. when i returned back from the restroom it was up in the sky that is when i stared to film. then we jumped in the car and noticed another one far on the right traveling far beside us. we tried driving some more we pulled over again at a truck rest stop because we were so tired we were swerving off the road so we stopped and i went to sleep looking up at the ufo threw the sun roof. then we woke up around seven or eight in the morning. our phones where dead but i saw it again in the light blue morning sky with some white cloud then i something silverish in the clouds then it flew back and disappeared.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Amazing! it flew in many directions

content.detailedDescription:
I'm french, managing since 10 years a company in ecuador. i was close to my car and to the swimming pool of my urbanization.
it was the end of the day and it was clear. i have seen, just in front of me 2 objects with the appearance of comet (asteroid). on following the other one at a real high speed but without noise.
the head was green and the tail was white. 
the 2 objects just fly in direction of the clouds, disappear, reappear after the clouds and disappear again. 
very fast and no sound (the place i live is really quite). the shape and the lights are not normal to be a plane. i asked to a pilot from the army base of manta if they are using drones like this or any kind of plane, and he told me not.
i immediately talk to people i know and check internet if i was alone or not to see this. it was the case until one week after.
on the 16th of april, my city(manta-ecuador) had a big earthquake, destroying most part of the city and killing so many people. this day, people in different part of ecuador said that they have seen the same objects in the sky. one week after my observation. the object look like the video you can find in youtube typing "luz verde de argentina". it seems that it's not the first time that something happend before an earthquake (or during). i didn't know before my observation. 
i join some drawing i did for the french organism geipan who told me to send to mufon my observations, because it happended outside france.
content.summary: 2 objects like a bright comet following each other at a high speed without noise

content.detailedDescription: It was totally cloudy out no stars or moon i was letting my dpg out at about 1 30 in the morning when i saw this light moving weird so i took picture with phone and when i looked at them it was a shape of a half triangle on the next nite i was looking to see if it would be there again and this time i took pictures they were three lights straight across and what is weirder is on the second nite my friend had seen a flat bed truck with suv escorts with what looked like a disc shape object on it really big while the escorts were blocking traffic so truck could go down road heading towards our local subbase.He saw all this at same time i saw the lights over about where the subbase is.He told me this the next day and then i told him what i saw at same time.He wasnt sure what he saw till after he described it to me i showed him some video that was on the web of what he described and it freaked him out cause that was what he saw also....I have also seen these strange lights that move so fast across the sky that it is not any aircraft i know of that can move that fast....Something is going on around here that is not normal....Being a construction worker i have seen discs over nuclear plant in the daytime...I also have pictures of black humanoid looking thing flying around from a bridge we were working on....Not to keen on getting pics on computer but will save for anyone who can or wants to see cause they are very strange and not fake or i would not waste my time these things have definitely made an impact on our lives...Something very real and not of the norm is going on here
content.summary: Seen lights 2 nites in a row..Have picturesit was totally

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my bedroom watching tv and i look out the window and clearly see a fairly bright light much like a star pulsating, with red, green, and white colours flashing randomly. this is not the first time i see it, as it might be a star but because it is pulsating clearly i am suspicious that it is not. i did not lose sight of the ufo as i fell asleep. i understand people might think it is a star but if they were to see it they would be mystified how brightly it flashes in the clear night sky.
content.summary: Red, green, white light non moving stationary above bolton ontario. somewhat like star but pulsating.

content.detailedDescription: I was about to go in the house from sitting at my fire pit,, i often just stare at the stars.  4-29-2016 was cloudless in rocky mt, va i glanced up and saw a bright object that appeared to be in orbit like the iss appears,, however, the iss flies from west to east over my house, this object flew from south to north directly over my head.  i was able to view this for about 2 to 3 minutes.  it never changed course or sped up, but disappeared from view as it got closer to the town lights.  i came in the house immediately and checked the position off the iss which to my surprise was over the ocean and not view-able from my location.  the time was approximately 9:20 pm when i saw this object.
content.summary: Iss flies west to east over my house, this flew south to north

content.detailedDescription:
1
    this has been happening since i was 8 years old i am now 51 years old it has happened in many places around the world they seem to just find you. 

2 
     they let you know they are there.

3
     the first time i didn't know what it was i was terified  but soon found out.

4 
     the environment keeps changing it is hard to say.

5 
     pain , lost time. gained time, gained vast amounts of information unwillingly , had no control of the situation,since my first encounter i have suffered with a complete unawareness of time and how unimportant it is in the big picture of things, i have spent a life time in innovation and design, i have built many of the things i have seen and have a complete understanding of them all.
 i have met many phd, dr, physicist, and engineers,in many areas from medical to aerospace,propulsion power generation. 
and i have been able to not just keep up with them but 9 out of 10 times i run rings around them not meaning any disrespect. its just my understanding of things are now different .

5 
    you don't loose site of them , time just seems to change and its all over.
content.summary: Shift in time, diffrent  memories, 7 very tall  11 child like that move very fast always blurred out you can never see them long enough to see them.

content.detailedDescription: I work in a call center and we have night shift it was break time for us and i was out in balcony wherei could see a blue beam which was a bit abnormal, so i went on top of building and could see the ufo very clearly with blue white lights blinking and it was not more than 100 feets away from me. it was around 12 mins there and then slowly started moving upwards and in few seconds speed and disappeared.
content.summary: Ufo

content.detailedDescription:
I was at the beach at night time and just decided to take a picture of a bright star in the sky
so i did and was very surprised at what i captured. i actually caught the object morphing from shape to a different shape and so forth. i didn't lose sight of it because it appears to be just a bright star in the universe.
content.summary: What looked like a star turned up like this on my picture.

content.detailedDescription:
Apr 28 at aprox 8:45pm, time and date on the dash cam is wrong. dash cam video at night isn't that
 great. this object was located over the augusta city.
i turn on the cam seeing this object in the air. the object is located in the middle of the screen 
to the left of the green looking sign.

it had two vert brigjt lights in the sky. seems close somewhat. very bright lights pointed in 
the driection at me. i expect it was a plane but with the lights told me it was headed/pointed east. 
odd thing was that is seems to all of a sudden move westward and seems like it was sitting their 
for a minute or so in the same position. you can see that when i stop at the red-light.
most air plane make a wide swing to turn, this one did not.
their is an airport to the southwest. as it moved away i was able to see a blinking red light under it.
not sure what this may have been. orgional footage added.
content.summary: Unknown object observed over augusta ga

content.detailedDescription:
When i was a kid, for two years from 1959 to 1961 my family lived in churchill, manitoba, canada. it may have been around mid-october 1959  later in the year, but before snowfall that i was on my way to cub scouts when i saw something unusual. to get to the cub shack, i would cut through a number of buildings, generally trying to avoid walking outside too much because of the risk of encountering polar bears. 

however, the last leg of the walk to the shack was down a dirt road isolated from other buildings. to provide some perspective, the hudson bay was to my right across an expanse of rocks as i walked towards the cub shack. suddenly, another kid on his way to cubs up the road ahead of me said, look at that, or words to that effect. looking up, i saw a perfect circle profiled against the already dark sky. 

the circumference of the circle was clearly defined, but the interior looked like a rolling cloud or plasma about as bright as neon (as i would think later when i saw neon signs in regina), though there was no lighting effect on the ground. i dont recall the colour when i first saw it, but of those i can recall, it would transition through red, green, yellow, a dark colour that made it look like it had disappeared, and white. 

the colour changes accompanied a rolling appearance in the cloud or plasma towards the center. that rolling motion can be visualized by imagining the effect of tossing a stone in a pond and watching the waves ripple out from the point that the stone hit the water, but in reverse, such that the rolling, wave motion moved from the periphery of the circle inwards, towards the center. 

as soon as the rolling wave hit the center, the entire colour changed, and the sequence repeated. it was quite spectacular. thinking that it was the northern lights, i thought that i should try to remember the sequence of colour changes so that i could tell my parents and they would know i really saw the northern lights. but, whenever i thought i had the sequence nailed, either it changed or i was uncharacteristically confused. 

after a couple or more minutes of this, the other kid further up the road said, wed better hurry, or wed be late, and i went on to cubs. oddly, perhaps, i always thought of what i saw as the northern lights, and even when i saw pictures of the northern lights later i would just think that the one i saw was better. at about seventeen, when i told the story of my northern lights to someone i knew who was studying television repair at algonquin college, he said that what i saw was a ufo, so i got some books and read up on ufos and concluded that he was probably right. 

if it was a ufo, it was either very large or very low because i was looking straight upward at it the whole time and it virtually filled my field of vision. unfortunately, though, i neither saw it come nor go, it was just there when i looked up, and it never occurred to me to look back when i left. i have been lucky enough to see a few ufos since that time, but it has always seemed strange to me that they have always been different, one from the other, and that in reading reports ive never come across one described quite like that one in churchill. the dates are my best guess. i put this story online once a couple of years ago in the hope that one of the other kids who must have seen it would come forward, or that someone who saw something like this anywhere else would say so. no luch so far.
content.summary: Possibly late 1959, churchill, while on way to cubs, saw a stationary object, circular from the bottom, that transitioned through sequential colour changes.

content.detailedDescription:
Around noon, april 16. 2016 saturday:  i was riding with someone in the rural part of lavergne, tn rutherford co. on stones river road and out in the distance toward four corners rec. i seen a huge black rectangle shaped object (flipped up like a billboard) that was almost see through looking (hard to describe), it did not appear to be moving. it was between the cloud deck and where a water tower would be.  it was about the size of a football field.
the treeline came up and blocked my view so i only seen it for about 4 to 5 seconds. i watched the entire time we were on that road in hopes of seeing again to no avail. 
if i were driving i would have went back and made video but unfortunately i was riding with someone who was in a hurry... 
i really couldn't make sense of what i was seeing to be honest. it was a very strange experience because i could not place what i was seeing. it was not a helicopter, plane, drone, kite, solar balloon, hot air balloon etc etc.
content.summary: Daytime sighting black rectangle  lavergne, tn rutherford county

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home and i looked out my left window and seen 5 huge lights hovering in the sky so i did a u-turn and pulled in a parking lot to get a better view. i watched it for about 15 minutes and it never moved it just hovered there. i watched in awe. i knew exactly what i was seeing without a doubt in my mind. i was so amazed i didn't even think to video it, which is one of my biggest regrets ever! 
it looked exactly like the video posted by submitter 74278, i believe we seen the same object. the shape was hard to tell. 
this was in january 2016 in lavergne, tn. around 9 pm.
this is one of the most amazing things i have ever seen!
content.summary: 5 lights hovering in rutherford co. 4 white and 1 red

content.detailedDescription: I was driving down the road with my husband and my son and looked up in the sky just above and in front of us and here was a huge orange ball of light. we pulled over in a parking lot, got out, and the ball split into several balls. four total. they moved around really fast yet didn't seem to go anywhere. they merged back to one ball and vanished. but not like someone turned off a light. almost like it moved so fast away that it seemed to disappear. gave me goose bumps. my husband has been seeing this same thing since we moved here four years ago. he works on the beach at night and sees them all the time. i used to laugh at him. i'm not laughing now. i don't see how everybody doesn't see them. they were huge. and they were just right there. no noise.
content.summary: Large orange ball, became several, zinged around really fast, merged back to one, vanished

content.detailedDescription: Looking out of window saw a large golden object red blinking light on bottom, and white light on top. was mooving at a moderate speed. no soung.
content.summary: Looked our window saw a large bright yellow object. a red light blinking on bottom.
